description: Demolition of existing buildings on site (including a locally listed building at 29-30 Wakley Street) and mixed use redevelopment of the site in the form of two seven storey blocks, one comprising 8 flats (4x2 bed, 2x1 bed, and 2 studios) and the other 146 self contained student bedrooms (sui generis) with 300sqm of A1(retail) / A2(financial & professional services) / A3(restaurants & cafes) / B1(office) Uses at ground floor levels to both buildings.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The ground floor common room and laundry shall be provided and of usable state prior to the first occupation of the student accommodation.  The reception / main office, which shall be staffed on a 24hr basis, shall also be provided prior to first occupation of the student accommodation.

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, maintained as such thereafter and no change there from shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON:  To ensure that these essential facilities are available and operational at the time of the occupation of the student accommodation and to ensure that the main office is staffed on a 24hr basis.
